content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you, Max. So, what rental price are you looking for? I'm interested in maximizing my gains, so I'm open to discussing a fair price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. I am a student and I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. Can you tell me more about the apartment?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Certainly, Max. The apartment is 25 square meters and is located in a quiet area of the city. It has a cozy living room, a small kitchen, and a bedroom. The apartment has a balcony with a nice view of the city. The building has a laundry room and a storage room for your belongings.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of €250 per month. Thank you for your offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm glad we could come to an agreement, Max. €250 per month is a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment in a quiet area of the city. I'm sure you'll enjoy your stay here. Please let me know if you need anything else, such as a move-in date or additional information.
name: Heinrich Heine
